9. You cut the budget.

////////////// ASSIGNMENT ///////////////

Make a you fix the budget calculator. call it a7-federal-budget.

////////////////////////////////////////

You fix the budget. The goal is to cut the federal budget by $2 trillion. Let the user pick and choose what to cut and give them feedback on how far they need to go.

  1. copy your current project to get the basic structure.
  2. sketch what you want your budget fixer to look like.
  3. code up your html.
  4. add style.
  5. write out in english what you want your js to do.
  6. write your js.
